markdown:
**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 127 **Archetype** [Wrestler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=127) **Prerequisites** [Wrestler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3394) **Requirements** You have a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33). --- You squeeze your opponent in a vicious bear hug, putting intense pressure on their nerves, joints, or other pain points. Attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) the creature you have grabbed or restrained, with the following effects instead of the usual effects. **Critical Success** The target is [clumsy 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) until the end of its next turn and clumsy 1 for 1 minute.
**Success** The target is clumsy 1 until the end of its next turn.
name: Spinebreaker
requirement: You have a creature  grabbed  or  restrained .

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 127</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Wrestler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3394)

**Requirements**
You have a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33).

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
You squeeze your opponent in a vicious bear hug, putting intense pressure on their nerves, joints, or other pain points.
</summary>
summary: You squeeze your opponent in a vicious bear hug, putting intense pressure on their nerves, joints, or other pain points.

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 10" pfs="Standard" > Spinebreaker Single Action Source Grand Bazaar pg. 127 Archetype Wrestler Prerequisites Wrestler Dedication Requirements You have a creature grabbed or restrained. --- You squeeze your opponent in a vicious bear hug, putting intense pressure on their nerves, joints, or other pain points. Attempt an Athletics check to Grapple the creature you have grabbed or restrained, with the following effects instead of the usual effects. Critical Success The target is clumsy 2 until the end of its next turn and clumsy 1 for 1 minute. Success The target is clumsy 1 until the end of its next turn.
